channel.title: Projects on Pedro Martelleto
channel.description: Recent content in Projects on Pedro Martelleto

item.title: AI Playground
item.description: Visualizing neuroevolution in videogames on the browser

item.title: Compila
item.description: Online platform for building mock exams for Brazil’s University Entrance Exam

item.title: Arena C++ Game
item.description: A simple 16-bit arena game implemented in modern C++ that features a multithreaded Job System and an Entity Component System.

item.title: Book store
item.description: An online book store built using the MERN stack (MongoDB, Express, React, Node.js)

item.title: Automated breast cancer diagnosis from digital biomarkers
item.description: An interactive web interface with explainable AI

item.title: Issues in detecting COVID-19 from X-Rays
item.description: Mitigating issues of current approaches to image-based COVID-19 diagnosis

item.title: CoviData
item.description: A dashboard showing Brazil’s COVID-19 data, written in Java
